briefTitle: A Study of Tadalafil in Men With Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH) and Erectile Dysfunction (ED)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tadalafil Once-Daily Dosing for 12 Weeks in Men With Signs and Symptoms of Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia and Erectile Dysfunction
summary: The purpose of this study is to see whether tadalafil can reduce the signs and symptoms in men with Erectile Dysfunction (ED) and Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia-Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms (BPH-LUTS) and improve their quality of life.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Total International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) at Week 12
